Real Experience Pays

At Molex, you have the chance to team up with determined employees and work every day to create a smarter, smaller, greener and safer world. Here, you can get real, valuable experience right away in your areas of interest while making a difference by helping produce electronic connectors for thousands of products.

Molex By The Numbers

TURNING TECHNOLOGY INSIDE OUT

You may not know our name, but you know our work. From life-saving medical equipment to the device you’re wielding right now to look at this page, the innovations Molex creates can be found inside thousands of products used every day around the world.

Frequently Asked Questions

What roles do you have for internships and college graduates?

As a technology company that constantly strives to innovate, many of our employment opportunities are in engineering, accounting, IT, finance and business.

When do you hire interns?

Our process varies by location. Our Lisle, Illinois, and Little Rock, Arkansas, sites offer summer internship programs. But all of our sites hire interns for part-time, year-round employment. Each open role will have the time listed in the job description.

What is the application process?

It’s simple. Click this link, search for the job you want and follow the instructions.
